input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System, 13-Foot,Hercules,LS234H" />

Item features:
Meets all applicable OSHA requirements
Exclusive Patented Stainless Steel Hinge Locks
Exclusive Integrated Anti-Twist Truss brace Supports
Super Lightweight
Meets or Exceeds All Applicable Requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI
input_text.Response A: Looking for a lightweight ladder system that meets all applicable OSHA requirements? Look no further than the Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System. This 13-foot ladder system is designed with exclusive Patented Stainless Steel Hinge Locks and Exclusive Integrated Anti-Twist Truss brace Supports to provide you with the safest and most durable ladder system possible. Plus, it meets or exceeds all applicable requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI. So, if you're looking for a reliable and durable ladder system, the Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System is the perfect choice for you.
input_text.Response B:
Attention: Hercules multipurpose ladder system
Interest: This ladder system is very safe, sturdy, and reliable.
Desire: I want to own this ladder system for my home.
Action: Click “Add to Cart” to purchase the Hercules multipurpose ladder system.

label_annotations.factors_a: Overall length, while it was meant to be catchy and concise it was hard to know the desired length
label_annotations.feedback: I didn't know what AIDA framework was and whether this would impact the formatting but I thought this would more mean what should be included not a bullet point list.
